emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of leaders in the Allegheny Union Baptist Association, including left to right: Reverends H. R. Williams, J. A. Williams, G. F. Nelson, E. P. Tunie, A. M. Waller, S. L. Spear, S. A. Thurston, and H. H. Gaines, posed in Metropolitan Baptist Church, Northside, another version
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 24, 1954, pg. 6, reads: "Baptist Leaders Greet Moderator - Dr. E. pg. Tunie was greeted by leaders of the Allegheny Union Baptist Association at Metropolitan Baptist Church, North Side, last week. Here, left to right, the Revs. H. R. Williams, secretary; J. A. Williams, former moderator, UBA: G. F. Nelson, a director; E. P. Tunie, moderator; B. H. Logan, chairman, board of directors; A. M. Waller, vice moderator; S. L. Spear, host pastor and former moderator of ABGA; S. A. Thurston, elected first treasurer, and H. H. Gaines, corresponding secretary. - Harris Photo."
